Headline: #4 Cottage Grove Temporary Reroute at Cottage Grove/73rd
ShortDescription: 4 Cottage Grove buses are temporarily rerouted via Cottage Grove, 73rd, King Drive, 71st and Cottage Grove: due to, street blockage near Cottage Grove/73rd.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#4 Cottage Grove buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Cottage Grove, 73rd, King Drive, 71st and Cottage Grove, due to street blockage near Cottage Grove/73rd.

Allow extra travel time.
